languages.text: {n}Мыслеобраз оживает: вы на коленях, руки связаны за спиной. Запястья распухли от боли, ссадины на лице зудят. Мужчина в богатом костюме стоит спиной, но обращается явно к вам:{/n} "Ты думал, что сможешь предать меня и уйти целым? Ты никогда не был умным, но я и подумать не мог, что ты идиот. Жадность не порок, приятель, но вот глупость... Считай, что я оказываю тебе услугу". {n}Вы едва успеваете уловить блеск оружия в руке капитана, череп — ваш или предателя — взрывается болью, и тиски чужих воспоминаний отпускают ваши мысли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Мыслеобраз оживает: вы на коленях, руки связаны за спиной. Запястья распухли от боли, ссадины на лице зудят. Мужчина в богатом костюме стоит спиной, но обращается явно к вам:{/n} "Ты думал, что сможешь предать меня и уйти целым? Ты никогда не был умным, но я и подумать не мог, что ты идиот. Жадность не порок, приятель, но вот глупость... Считай, что я оказываю тебе услугу". {n}Вы едва успеваете уловить блеск оружия в руке капитана, череп — ваш или предателя — взрывается болью, и тиски чужих воспоминаний отпускают ваши мысли.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A mental image comes to life: you are on your knees, your hands tied behind your back. Your wrists are painfully swollen, and your face stings with numerous abrasions. A finely dressed man stands with his back turned, but it is clearly you he is talking to.{/n} "Did you think you could betray me and get away in one piece? You were never smart, but I had no idea you were an idiot. There's nothing wrong with a bit of greed, my dear fellow. Stupidity, on the other hand... Think of this as me doing you a favour." {n}You barely have time to register the glint of a weapon in the captain's hand before a burst of pain shatters the traitor's skull — your skull — and your mind is released from the grip of the shared memory.{/n}

Жадность не порок, приятель, но вот глупость... Считай, что я оказываю тебе услугу". {n}Вы едва успеваете уловить блеск оружия в руке капитана, череп — ваш или предателя — взрывается болью, и тиски чужих воспоминаний отпускают ваши мысли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A mental image comes to life: you are on your knees, your hands tied behind your back. Your wrists are painfully swollen, and the scrapes on your face are smarting. A finely dressed man is standing with his back to you, but it is clearly you he is talking to.{/n} "Did you think you could betray me and get away in one piece? You were never smart, but I had no idea you were an idiot. There's nothing wrong with a bit of greed, my dear fellow. Stupidity, on the other hand... Think of this as me doing you a favour." {n}You barely have time to register the glint of a weapon in the captain's hand before a burst of pain shatters the traitor's skull — your skull — and your mind is released from the grip of a shared memory.{/n}

languages.text: {n}心に映像が浮かび上がった。あなたは膝をつき、両手を背中で縛られている。あなたの手首は痛々しく腫れ上がり、顔についた無数の擦り傷がひりついた。上等な服を着た男が背を向けて立っているが、彼が話しかけているのは明らかにあなた自身だった。{/n}「私を裏切って無事で済むとでも思ったのか？お前が賢くないのは分かっていたが、ここまでバカだとは思わなかった。親愛なる友よ、少しくらいの欲なら構わん。だが、愚かさは別だ…これは私なりの親切と思え」{n}キャプテンの手にきらりと光る武器に気づく間もなく、激しい痛みが裏切り者、すなわちあなた自身の頭蓋を打ち砕き、あなたの意識は共有された記憶の束縛から解き放たれた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A mental image comes to life: you are on your knees, your hands tied behind your back. Your wrists are painfully swollen, and your face stings with numerous abrasions. A finely dressed man stands with his back turned, but it is clearly you he is talking to.{/n} "Did you think you could betray me and get away in one piece? You were never smart, but I had no idea you were an idiot. There's nothing wrong with a bit of greed, my dear fellow. Stupidity, on the other hand... Think of this as me doing you a favour." {n}You barely have time to register the glint of a weapon in the captain's hand before a burst of pain shatters the traitor's skull — your skull — and your mind is released from the grip of the shared memory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}心に映像が浮かび上がった。あなたは膝をつき、両手を背中で縛られている。あなたの手首は痛々しく腫れ上がり、顔についた無数の擦り傷がひりついた。上等な服を着た男が背を向けて立っているが、彼が話しかけているのは明らかにあなた自身だった。{/n}「私を裏切って無事で済むとでも思ったのか？お前が賢くないのは分かっていたが、ここまでバカだとは思わなかった。親愛なる友よ、少しくらいの欲なら構わん。だが、愚かさは別だ…これは私なりの親切と思え」{n}キャプテンの手にきらりと光る武器に気づく間もなく、激しい痛みが裏切り者、すなわちあなた自身の頭蓋を打ち砕き、あなたの意識は共有された記憶の束縛から解き放たれた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein mentales Bild erwacht zum Leben: Du bist auf den Knien, deine Hände sind hinter deinem Rücken gefesselt. Deine Handgelenke sind schmerzhaft angeschwollen und auf deinem Gesicht brennen mehrere Schürfwunden. Ein gut gekleideter Mann steht vor dir, den Rücken zu dir gekehrt. Er spricht aber offenkundig mit dir. {/n}"Dachtet Ihr, Ihr könntet mich ungestraft verraten? Sonderlich klug wart Ihr nie, aber mir war nicht klar, dass Ihr ein ausgewachsener Vollidiot seid. Ein wenig Gier ist nicht verkehrt, Kindchen. Dummheit dagegen ... Ich tue Euch einen Gefallen, erkennt das bitte." {n}Du hast kaum Zeit, das Aufblitzen einer Waffe in der Hand des Kapitäns zu registrieren, ehe ein plötzlicher Schmerz den Schädel des Verräters zertrümmert ... deinen Schädel ... und die Klauen der gemeinsamen Erinnerung deinen Verstand freigeben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A mental image comes to life: you are on your knees, your hands tied behind your back. Your wrists are painfully swollen, and your face stings with numerous abrasions. A finely dressed man stands with his back turned, but it is clearly you he is talking to.{/n} "Did you think you could betray me and get away in one piece? You were never smart, but I had no idea you were an idiot. There's nothing wrong with a bit of greed, my dear fellow. Stupidity, on the other hand... Think of this as me doing you a favour." {n}You barely have time to register the glint of a weapon in the captain's hand before a burst of pain shatters the traitor's skull — your skull — and your mind is released from the grip of the shared memory.{/n}

Deine Handgelenke sind schmerzhaft angeschwollen und auf deinem Gesicht brennen mehrere Schürfwunden. Ein gut gekleideter Mann steht vor dir, den Rücken zu dir gekehrt. Er spricht aber offenkundig mit dir. {/n}"Dachtet Ihr, Ihr könntet mich ungestraft verraten? Sonderlich klug wart Ihr nie, aber mir war nicht klar, dass Ihr ein ausgewachsener Vollidiot seid. Ein wenig Gier ist nicht verkehrt, Kindchen. Dummheit dagegen ... Ich tue Euch einen Gefallen, erkennt das bitte." {n}Du hast kaum Zeit, das Aufblitzen einer Waffe in der Hand des Kapitäns zu registrieren, ehe ein plötzlicher Schmerz den Schädel des Verräters zertrümmert ... deinen Schädel ... und die Klauen der gemeinsamen Erinnerung deinen Verstand freigeben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une image prend forme dans votre esprit : vous êtes à genoux, les mains attachées dans le dos. Vous sentez la douleur de vos poignets enflés et la brûlure des nombreuses éraflures qui strient votre visage. Un homme élégamment vêtu se tient devant vous. Bien qu'il ait le dos tourné, il est clair qu'il s'adresse à vous.{/n} « Pensais-tu vraiment pouvoir me trahir impunément ? Tu n'as jamais été bien malin, mais je ne te croyais tout de même pas aussi idiot. Je n'ai rien contre l'avidité, cher ami, tant qu'elle reste raisonnable. La stupidité, en revanche... Dis-toi que je te rends service. » {n}Vous avez à peine le temps d'apercevoir l'arme dans la main du capitaine avant que le crâne du traître – votre crâne – n'éclate dans une explosion de douleur. À cet instant, votre esprit est libéré de l'emprise du souvenir partagé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A mental image comes to life: you are on your knees, your hands tied behind your back. Your wrists are painfully swollen, and your face stings with numerous abrasions. A finely dressed man stands with his back turned, but it is clearly you he is talking to.{/n} "Did you think you could betray me and get away in one piece? You were never smart, but I had no idea you were an idiot. There's nothing wrong with a bit of greed, my dear fellow. Stupidity, on the other hand... Think of this as me doing you a favour." {n}You barely have time to register the glint of a weapon in the captain's hand before a burst of pain shatters the traitor's skull — your skull — and your mind is released from the grip of the shared memory.{/n}

Vous sentez la douleur de vos poignets enflés et la brûlure des nombreuses éraflures qui strient votre visage. Un homme élégamment vêtu se tient devant vous. Bien qu'il ait le dos tourné, il est clair qu'il s'adresse à vous.{/n} « Pensais-tu vraiment pouvoir me trahir impunément ? Tu n'as jamais été bien malin, mais je ne te croyais tout de même pas aussi idiot. Je n'ai rien contre l'avidité, cher ami, tant qu'elle reste raisonnable. La stupidité, en revanche... Dis-toi que je te rends service. » {n}Vous avez à peine le temps d'apercevoir l'arme dans la main du capitaine avant que le crâne du traître – votre crâne – n'éclate dans une explosion de douleur. À cet instant, votre esprit est libéré de l'emprise du souvenir partagé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una imagen cobra vida en tu mente: estás de rodillas, con las manos atadas a la espalda. Tienes las muñecas doloridas e inflamadas, y el rostro te escuece debido a numerosas abrasiones. Un hombre de atuendo elegante te da la espalda, pero está claro que te habla a ti.{/n} «¿De verdad creías que podrías traicionarme y salirte con la tuya? Nunca fuiste muy inteligente, pero no imaginé que serías tan idiota. Un poco de avaricia no tiene nada de malo. La estupidez, por otro lado... Tómate esto como un favor que te hago». {n}Apenas tienes tiempo de vislumbrar el brillo del arma que empuña el capitán antes de que un dolor lacerante destroce el cráneo del traidor (tu cráneo), y tu mente se libera por fin del recuerdo compartido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A mental image comes to life: you are on your knees, your hands tied behind your back. Your wrists are painfully swollen, and your face stings with numerous abrasions. A finely dressed man stands with his back turned, but it is clearly you he is talking to.{/n} "Did you think you could betray me and get away in one piece? You were never smart, but I had no idea you were an idiot. There's nothing wrong with a bit of greed, my dear fellow. Stupidity, on the other hand... Think of this as me doing you a favour." {n}You barely have time to register the glint of a weapon in the captain's hand before a burst of pain shatters the traitor's skull — your skull — and your mind is released from the grip of the shared memory.{/n}

Un hombre de atuendo elegante te da la espalda, pero está claro que te habla a ti.{/n} «¿De verdad creías que podrías traicionarme y salirte con la tuya? Nunca fuiste muy inteligente, pero no imaginé que serías tan idiota. Un poco de avaricia no tiene nada de malo. La estupidez, por otro lado... Tómate esto como un favor que te hago». {n}Apenas tienes tiempo de vislumbrar el brillo del arma que empuña el capitán antes de que un dolor lacerante destroce el cráneo del traidor (tu cráneo), y tu mente se libera por fin del recuerdo compartido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的脑海中浮现出了鲜活的画面——你跪在地上，双手被反绑在背后。你的手腕被勒肿了，疼痛不已。一个衣着考究的男人背对你站着，但很明显，他是在对你开口。{/n}“你真的以为背叛了我，还能安然无恙，一走了之吗？你的脑子一直都不太灵光，但我没想到你居然这么蠢。做人贪婪点不是什么大问题，我的好伙计，可愚蠢的话……算了，就当我是帮你个忙吧。”{n}你注意到船长手中的武器闪过了一道寒光，随后一阵剧痛猛然袭来——叛徒的头骨，也就是你的头骨，被打碎了。在那之后，你的意识从共通记忆的束缚中解脱了出来。{/n}

A finely dressed man stands with his back turned, but it is clearly you he is talking to.{/n} "Did you think you could betray me and get away in one piece? You were never smart, but I had no idea you were an idiot. There's nothing wrong with a bit of greed, my dear fellow. Stupidity, on the other hand... Think of this as me doing you a favour." {n}You barely have time to register the glint of a weapon in the captain's hand before a burst of pain shatters the traitor's skull — your skull — and your mind is released from the grip of the shared memory.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zihninde yeni bir görüntü hayat buluyor. Ellerin arkadan bağlı, dizlerinin üzerindesin. Bileklerin acı içinde şişmiş, sızlayan yüzün sıyrıklarla kaplı. İyi giyimli bir adam, sırtı sana dönük dursa da belli ki seninle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bana ihanet edip paçayı sıyırabileceğini mi sandın? Akıllı olmadığın belliydi de bu kadar aptal olduğunu bilmiyordum. Açgözlülüğü hoş görebilirim dostum ama aptallık öyle mi... Bunu bir iyilik farz et." {n}Kaptanın elindeki silahtan yansıyan ışık gözüne çarpar çarpmaz hainin (ve dolayısıyla senin) kafatasını parçalayan acı dalgasını hissediyorsun. Zihnin, anının boyunduruğundan bir anda kurtuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A mental image comes to life: you are on your knees, your hands tied behind your back. Your wrists are painfully swollen, and your face stings with numerous abrasions. A finely dressed man stands with his back turned, but it is clearly you he is talking to.{/n} "Did you think you could betray me and get away in one piece? You were never smart, but I had no idea you were an idiot. There's nothing wrong with a bit of greed, my dear fellow. Stupidity, on the other hand... Think of this as me doing you a favour." {n}You barely have time to register the glint of a weapon in the captain's hand before a burst of pain shatters the traitor's skull — your skull — and your mind is released from the grip of the shared memory.{/n}

İyi giyimli bir adam, sırtı sana dönük dursa da belli ki seninle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bana ihanet edip paçayı sıyırabileceğini mi sandın? Akıllı olmadığın belliydi de bu kadar aptal olduğunu bilmiyordum. Açgözlülüğü hoş görebilirim dostum ama aptallık öyle mi... Zihnin, anının boyunduruğundan bir anda kurtuluyor.{/n}
